div.em: Current conditions as of 27 Apr 09:53 am CDT

div.div: Mostly sunny, with a high near 80. South wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 58. Light and variable wind becoming southeast 5 to 7 mph in the evening.
A 50 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms after 1pm. Mostly cloudy, then becoming sunny during the afternoon, with a high near 80. South wind 5 to 11 mph becoming north in the afternoon.
